content:
On the night of March 19, Russian troops fired at the city of Selidovo in Donetsk two C-300 missiles.

About thisreportedSelidovsk city military administration.

The shelling happened around 02:30. As a result of hostile shelling, 4 civilians were injured.

In addition, 24 private homes were damaged.

As reported by the Armyinform, March 12 as a result of Russianrocket strokeIn the city of Selidovo destruction, 48 residential buildings - 18 apartment and 30 private.
title: The invaders at night fired Selidove S-300 missiles, there are wounded
description: This was reported by the Selidov City Military Administration. The shelling happened near ...
author: Army Inform
